extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of GPHY227 or GPHY228 or GPHY229, or permission of the Department.

basic.description: The movement of people across the surface of the earth from early times to the present, focusing on contemporary issues of immigration, refugees, human rights, social integration and barriers to integration including discussions of racism, citizenship, multiculturalism, and community infrastructure.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Human Migration
